r.d: Package containes locale validation for NZ such as: * IRD numbers * Regional codes * Telephone number * Postal code * Bank AC
r.n: - ssn : - doesnt use PCRE any more. - region : - now support region names aswell as codes - now support for north,south,east,west and central sectors of regions ie : Central Otago - bankcode : - doesnt use PCRE anymore
